title: The Catholic Bible Study Handbook: A Popular Introduction to Studying Scripture (Second Revised Edition)
features: offers Catholics a popular approach to personal and group Bible study. Everything you need to know to begin studying the Bible is contained in this easy-to-use guide.

puts a wealth of information at your fingertips. It makes the study of Scripture a rich and rewarding experience, helping you to understand God's Word and to apply it to your own life. A Servant Book.
description: JEROME KODELL, O.S.B., is the abbot of Subiaco Abbey, Arkansas. He is nationally known for his efforts in promoting Bible study among Catholics. His Scripture study program, first used in the diocese of Little Rock, Arkansas, is now popular across the country.
